text: Julie Anne Payne (July 10, 1940 â€“ June 7, 2019) was an American actress. She appeared in television and movies between 1959 and 1967. Payne's credits include movies Honeymoon Hotel (1964), Island of the Blue Dolphins (1964) and Don't Make Waves (1967), and series such as The Big Valley and The Wild Wild West. Payne was born in Los Angeles, California. She married screenwriter Robert Towne in 1977, and later divorced. The couple had a daughter. Payne died of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease on June 7, 2019. She was 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from COPD
title: Julie Payne (actress, born 1940)
